channel.title: Comments on: The World Waits for the FedEx Guy (or Gal!)

item.title: By: BigFreak
item.dc:creator: BigFreak
item.description: Awesome. I've heard play.com aren't usually so good on their pre-order delivery. Was thinking of using them as they're prices are always so low. I'll have to hit them up next time.
item.content:encoded: Awesome. I’ve heard play.com aren’t usually so good on their pre-order delivery. Was thinking of using them as they’re prices are always so low. I’ll have to hit them up next time.

item.title: By: Clare
item.dc:creator: Clare
item.description: I ordered mine from play.com (I live in the UK) and it unexpectedly arrived on the 15th. I had it installed and ready to go before midnight and it was free delivery. When midnight came, I was able to play. It was fantastic.
item.content:encoded: I ordered mine from play.com (I live in the UK) and it unexpectedly arrived on the 15th. I had it installed and ready to go before midnight and it was free delivery. When midnight came, I was able to play. It was fantastic.

item.title: By: steven v
item.dc:creator: steven v
item.content:encoded:
“We Warcrafters are like a swarm of locusts, we destroy everything in our path.”

very funny foton…. =)

Proff that even the retailers are not prepared. They should have headed Illidan’s words.

item.title: By: Eradon
item.dc:creator: Eradon
item.description: ZUPS! I've just been down at the local EB Games, it's one o'clock am in Denmark, but it doesn't matter, for I, Eradon Almighty, have been granted the gift of... THE BURNING CRUSADE!! Behold, for it has FOUR DISCS!! And a 10-days trial, for the sole person in my whole city who does NOT game! I Game, Therefore I Am And Now I Sleep, Therefore I Will Stop Typing
item.content:encoded:
ZUPS!
I’ve just been down at the local EB Games, it’s one o’clock am in Denmark, but it doesn’t matter, for I, Eradon Almighty, have been granted the gift of…
THE BURNING CRUSADE!!
Behold, for it has FOUR DISCS!! And a 10-days trial, for the sole person in my whole city who does NOT game!
I Game, Therefore I Am
And Now I Sleep, Therefore I Will Stop Typing

item.title: By: Dreaming

item.description:

item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Elliott
item.dc:creator: Elliott
item.description: A swarm of locusts that leaves a trail of cheeto dust.
item.content:encoded: A swarm of locusts that leaves a trail of cheeto dust.
